mapper.select: SELECT rn, RESERVE_SEQ ,USER_ID ,cr.MENU_SEQ ,cr.STORE_SEQ ,RESERVE_TIME ,RESERVE_STATE ,RESERVE_PRICE , RESERVE_SDATE ,RESERVE_EDATE ,RESERVE_REGDATE ,cm.MENU_NAME ,cs.STORE_NAME ,cs.STORE_ADDRESS FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()over(ORDER BY RESERVE_REGDATE DESC) AS rn,RESERVE_SEQ ,USER_ID ,MENU_SEQ ,STORE_SEQ ,RESERVE_TIME ,RESERVE_STATE ,RESERVE_PRICE ,RESERVE_SDATE ,RESERVE_EDATE ,RESERVE_REGDATE FROM CON_RESERVE WHERE RESERVE_STATE='Y') cr ,CON_MENU cm ,CON_STORE cs WHERE cr.menu_seq=cm.MENU_SEQ AND cr.store_seq=cs.STORE_SEQ AND CEIL(rn/5)=#{pnum} AND USER_ID =#{user_id}

SELECT COUNT(cr.RESERVE_TIME) AS ct ,cr.RESERVE_TIME FROM CON_RESERVE cr, CON_STORE cs WHERE cr.STORE_SEQ =cs.STORE_SEQ AND cr.STORE_SEQ =#{store_seq} AND cr.MENU_SEQ =#{menu_seq} AND cr.RESERVE_SDATE =#{reserve_sdate} AND cr.RESERVE_STATE='Y' GROUP BY RESERVE_TIME

SELECT RESERVE_SEQ,user_id,MENU_SEQ ,cr.STORE_SEQ ,RESERVE_TIME ,RESERVE_STATE ,RESERVE_PRICE ,RESERVE_SDATE ,RESERVE_EDATE ,RESERVE_REGDATE ,cs.STORE_MAXDATE FROM CON_RESERVE cr,CON_STORE cs WHERE cr.STORE_SEQ =cs.STORE_SEQ AND cr.STORE_SEQ =#{store_seq} AND MENU_SEQ =#{menu_seq} AND RESERVE_STATE='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE CON_RESERVE SET reserve_state='C' WHERE reserve_seq=#{reserve_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT rn,reserve_seq,STORE_SEQ ,store_photo_stored FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER()over(PARTITION BY cr.RESERVE_SEQ ORDER BY RESERVE_SEQ DESC) AS rn,cr.RESERVE_SEQ ,cr.STORE_SEQ ,csp.STORE_PHOTO_STORED FROM CON_RESERVE cr,CON_STORE_PHOTO csp WHERE cr.STORE_SEQ =csp.STORE_SEQ AND user_id=#{user_id}) WHERE rn=1
mapper.update: UPDATE CON_RESERVE SET RESERVE_STATE ='S' WHERE RESERVE_SEQ =#{reserve_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT RESERVE_SEQ ,USER_ID ,STORE_SEQ ,RESERVE_STATE FROM CON_RESERVE WHERE STORE_SEQ =#{store_seq} AND USER_ID =#{user_id} AND RESERVE_STATE ='S'
mapper.update: UPDATE CON_RESERVE SET RESERVE_STATE ='N' WHERE USER_ID =#{user_id} AND STORE_SEQ =#{store_seq}
